input.activity_signal: NENA database listing shows company DBA as 'Smart Carrier' (https://cid.nena.org/view.php?searchCID=TILTX), recent robocall monitoring data from 2024 shows active call traffic from Technology Innovation Lab LLC (rraptor.org), and Smart Carrier AUP document indicates ongoing service operations (s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.smartcarrier.io). ASTRICON speaker listing shows founder Orlando with 26+ years telecom experience and VoIP software development since 2002.
input.product_summary: Technology Innovation Lab LLC operates as Smart Carrier, providing VoIP services with over 26 years of telecom industry experience and specializing in high-volume VoIP software development since 2002.
